casebody.data:
ST. CHARLES SURGICAL HOSPITAL, LLC and Center for Restorative Breast Surgery, LLC
v.
LOUISIANA HEALTH SERVICE & INDEMNITY COMPANY d/b/a/ Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Louisiana, Blue Cross & Blue Shield of Louisiana, Inc., and HMO Louisiana, Inc. NO. 2018-CC-1118 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 15, 2018

Denied.
